text: Va cun ʙori xudro kusodand, sarmojaasonro joftand, ki ʙa onon ʙozgardonda suda ʙud. Guftand: «Padarcon, [digar] ci mexohem? In sarmojai most, ki ʙa mo ʙozgardonida sudaast, [ʙad-in vasila] ʙaroi xonavodai xud ozuqa meovarem va ʙarodaramonro [niz] hifozat mekunem va [ʙo ʙurdani Binjomin] jak ʙori sutur izofa megirem. In pajmona [ʙaroi Azizi Misr kori] osonest
